nexusFormationTask.warningText: To view this task, you must first complete [Check if Your Business Name is Available in New Jersey](/tasks/search-business-name-nexus)
nexusFormationTask.descriptionShownWithWarning: You must register your business name and `authorize|certificate-formation` your `legal structure|legal-structure-learn-more` with the State.
nexusFormationTask.dbaCtaModalBody:
This link will take you to a PDF.

Only pages 23 and 24 are relevant to your formation. Complete those pages and send them to Treasury, the address is on the top left of page 23.
